These numbers are a complete flip from where New Yorkers stood on the issue just six years ago. New York State voter attitudes about gay marriage have shifted dramatically since April 15, 2004, when Quinnipiac University first asked about gay marriage and found voters opposed the measure 55-37 percent, said Maurice Carroll, director of the Quinnipiac University Polling Institute. Aaron Rodgers was all smiles yesterday as a guest on "Late Show with David Letterman ." David Letterman handed Aaron Rodgers his WWE championship belt and even caught a pass across the stage from the Super Bowl MVP. There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there, Aaron Rodgers said as his eyes scanned the crowd, which was met with cheers from the probable Packer backers in attendance. David Letterman asked a series of light-hearted questions, with Aaron Rodgers willingly playing along.
